item.title: ç ´è§£Cloudflare Turnstile
item.description:
``` import pyautogui # ç”¨äºè‡ªåŠ¨æ§åˆ¶é¼ æ ‡å’Œé”®ç›˜ from DrissionPage import Chromium, ChromiumOptions # DrissionPage æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨äºæµè§ˆå™¨è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–çš„åº“ï¼ŒChromium ç±»ç”¨äºæ§åˆ¶ Chromium æµè§ˆå™¨
# 1. é…ç½® Chromium æµè§ˆå™¨é€‰é¡¹ co = ChromiumOptions().auto_port().incognito() # - auto_port(): è‡ªåŠ¨é…ç½®ç«¯å£ # - incognito(): å¯ç”¨æ— ç—•æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢ä¿å­˜æµè§ˆå†å²å’Œç¼“å­˜
# 2. å¯åŠ¨æµè§ˆå™¨ browser = Chromium(addr_or_opts=co) # - addr_or_opts=coï¼šä¼ å…¥æµè§ˆå™¨é…ç½®é€‰é¡¹
# 3. è·å–æµè§ˆå™¨å½“å‰æ ‡ç­¾é¡µ tab = browser.get_tab()
# 4. æ‰“å¼€ç›®æ ‡é¡µé¢ url = 'https://core.particle.network/cloudflare.html?language=en&theme=light&_=0.1.1&siteKey=0x4AAAAAAAaHm6FnzyhhmePw' tab.get(url, retry=3, interval=30, timeout=30) # - retry=3: å¦‚æœåŠ è½½å¤±è´¥ï¼Œæœ€å¤šé‡è¯• 3 æ¬¡ # - interval=30: æ¯æ¬¡é‡è¯•ä¹‹é—´çš„é—´éš” 30 ç§’ # - timeout=30: æœ€å¤§ç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´ 30 ç§’
# 5. è·å– Cloudflare Turnstile éªŒè¯çš„ shadow DOM å…ƒç´ shadow_root_ele1 = tab.ele('x://*[@id='cf-turnstile']/div').shadow_root # - é€šè¿‡ XPath æ‰¾åˆ°åŒ…å«éªŒè¯ç çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼š//*[@id='cf-turnstile']/div # - shadow_rootï¼šè·å–è¯¥å…ƒç´ çš„ shadow DOM æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹
# 6. åœ¨ shadow DOM ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ° iframe å…ƒç´ iframe1 = shadow_root_ele1.ele('t:iframe') # - ele('t:iframe'): é€šè¿‡æ ‡ç­¾å 'iframe' è·å–å­å…ƒç´
# 7. ç­‰å¾… 2 ç§’ï¼Œç¡®ä¿é¡µé¢å’Œ iframe åŠ è½½å®Œæˆ tab.wait(2)
# 8. è·å– iframe å†…éƒ¨çš„ shadow DOM shadow_root_ele2 = iframe1('x:/html/body').shadow_root # - é€šè¿‡ XPath 'x:/html/body' å®šä½ iframe å†…éƒ¨çš„ body å…ƒç´ # - shadow_rootï¼šè·å–è¯¥å…ƒç´ çš„ shadow DOM æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹
# 9. åœ¨ shadow DOM å†…æ‰¾åˆ° 'Verify you are human' çš„éªŒè¯å…ƒç´ verify_element = shadow_root_ele2.ele('Verify you are human') # - ele('Verify you are human'): æŸ¥æ‰¾åŒ…å«æ–‡æœ¬çš„å…ƒç´
# 10. è®¡ç®—ç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ åœ¨å±å¹•å’Œé¡µé¢ä¸­çš„ä½ç½® screen_x, screen_y = verify_element.rect.screen_location # è·å–å…ƒç´ åœ¨å±å¹•ä¸Šçš„ä½ç½®åæ ‡ page_x, page_y = tab.rect.page_location # è·å–æ ‡ç­¾é¡µçš„å·¦ä¸Šè§’åæ ‡
# 11. è®¡ç®—é¼ æ ‡ç‚¹å‡»ä½ç½® click_x, click_y = (screen_x + page_x - 20, screen_y - page_y - 5) # - è°ƒæ•´åæ ‡ä½ç½®ï¼š # - screen_x + page_x - 20: å‘å·¦å¾®è°ƒ 20 åƒç´ # - screen_y - page_y - 5: å‘ä¸Šå¾®è°ƒ 5 åƒç´
# 12. ä½¿ç”¨ pyautogui æ§åˆ¶é¼ æ ‡ç§»åŠ¨å’Œç‚¹å‡» pyautogui.moveTo(click_x, click_y, duration=0.01, tween=pyautogui.easeInElastic) # - moveTo(): ç§»åŠ¨é¼ æ ‡åˆ°æŒ‡å®šåæ ‡ # - duration=0.01: é¼ æ ‡ç§»åŠ¨æ—¶é—´ä¸º 0.01 ç§’ # - tween=pyautogui.easeInElastic: è®¾ç½®é¼ æ ‡ç§»åŠ¨çš„ç¼“åŠ¨æ•ˆæœ

item.title: å¸¸ç”¨Linuxå‘½ä»¤
item.description:
**å¼€å¯rootè¿œç¨‹ç™»å½•2**
```bash sed -i 's/#PermitRootLogin prohibit-password/PermitRootLogin yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config sed -i 's/PasswordAuthentication no/PasswordAuthentication yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config systemctl restart sshd ```
**å®˜ç½‘å®‰è£…docker** ```bash curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com | bash -s docker systemctl start docker systemctl enable docker ```
**å›½å†…å®‰è£…docker** ```bash bash <(curl -sSL https://linuxmirrors.cn/docker.sh) systemctl start docker systemctl enable docker ```
**BBR-PLUSè„šæœ¬** ```bash bash <(curl -Lso- https://git.io/kernel.sh) ```
**centoså…³é—­é˜²ç«å¢™** ```bash systemctl stop firewalld systemctl disable firewalld ```
**swap** ```bash wget https://www.moerats.com/usr/shell/swap.sh && bash swap.sh azure swap dd if=/dev/zero of=/swapfile count=4096 bs=1M chmod 600 /swapfile mkswap /swapfile swapon /swapfile vi /etc/fstab /swapfile none swap sw 0 0 ```
**myip** ```bash ip=$(curl -s http://myip.ipip.net) echo 'My public IP address is: $ip' ```
**danate** ```bash wget --no-check-certificate https://raw.github.com/Lozy/danted/master/install.sh -O install.sh bash install.sh --port=18888 --user=weijiajin --passwd=weijiajin
/etc/init.d/sockd adduser USERNAME PASSWORD sudo sed -i 's/del_uer/del_user/g' /etc/init.d/sockd /etc/init.d/sockd deluser USERNAME bash install.sh --uninstall systemctl enable sockd.service service sockd state /etc/init.d/sockd state ```
**å¢åŠ ç½‘å¡** ```bash ifconfig eth0:1 10.0.0.5 up ifconfig eth0:2 10.0.0.6 up ```
**x-ui** ```bash bash <(curl -Ls https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vaxilu/x-ui/master/install.sh) ``` **é‡è£…ç³»ç»Ÿ Debain12** ```bash apt install wget -y wget --no-check-certificate -qO InstallNET.sh 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/leitbogioro/Tools/master/Linux_reinstall/InstallNET.sh' && chmod a+x InstallNET.sh bash InstallNET.sh -debian
For Linux: LeitboGi0ro ```
**debian10å®‰è£…docker** ```bash sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install \ apt-transport-https \ ca-certificates \ curl \ gnupg2 \ software-properties-common y curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/debian/gpg | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/docker-archive-keyring.gpg echo \ 'deb [arch=amd64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/docker-archive-keyring.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/debian \ $(lsb_release -cs) stable' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null
sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io y git clone https://github.com/wejudging/x-ui.git cd x-ui docker compose up -d ```
